attributes.action: Increse the amount of universal creadit/ child benifit for bigger familys
attributes.background: I have 2 children under the ages of 3 and all i recieve a week is £34.40 for the week i need gass etc nappies wipes baby milk and food out of that and it is imposable for me to do as i get paid universal creadit monthly but as they have cut out child tax familys are not getting enough to provide

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure by how much you'd like child benefit and universal credit to be increased, or what exactly you mean by "bigger families". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
